short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SpiderNow's Technical SEO and Web Audit tools are designed to help website owners discover and improve On-Page SEO issues.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our SEO tools are a free extension for Google Chrome browser. It will help you discover SEO issues, fix errors, and improve your search engine rankings.

This free extension is like having an SEO sidekick right in your browser. It will help you analyze all of your pages for SEO and help you discover ways to boost your rankings in the search engines. It quickly captures every element of your website in real-time and then highlights issues and errors that need attention. This can range from meta, link, css, scripts tags, poor optimization, page speed, performance and other unknown factors within seconds. 

Now daily SEO tasks can be easier to manage so install our free extension today!


USE OUR TOOLS TO CHECK FOR:

Meta Robots & Directives:
- Discover blocked URLs blocked by robot.txt protocol, noindex, follow, nofollow, noarchive, nosnippet
- Show blocked resources in rendering mode

 
Inlinks & Outlinks:
- Display all pages that the URL links to
- Display all of the pages linking to a URL
- Scans for anchor text and if the link is a follow or a nofollow

 
Page Status:
- Displays if page is broken such as a 404
- Displays Server Default Port
- Displays Server Type
- Shows if page is secure with SSL or non-SSL
- Displays URL Response Time and Code
- Server Errors such as no responses, 4XX client & 5XX server errors
- Display issues with on ASCII characters, underscores, uppercase characters, parameters, or long URLs
- Show file size of URLs and Images
- Display Page Speed and Load Time
 

HTML Elements:
- Displays the number of each html elements occurring on the page


Images:
- Scans for Alt tags under 100 Characters
- Scans Current Page & Site for duplicates Images
- Displays Broken Images
- Discover Missing Alt Tags
- Scans Current Page & Site for duplicates Alt Tags
- Shows issues with Multiple Alt Tags


CSS:
- Scans for Broken CSS Links
- Scans for Current Page & Site Duplicates CSS
- Displays External CSS


Javascript:
- Scans for Broken Javascript Links
- Scans for Current Page & Site Duplicates Javascript
- Displays External Javascript

 
Hreflang:
- Scans for Duplicate Hreflang
- Displays Broken links
- Discover Redirect 301, 302, etc.
- Scans for Broken hreflang tag attribute
- Displays missing hreflang links
- Displays incorrect languages codes


Hyperlinks:
- Displays hyperlinks on the scanned page and connected pages that are broken
- Scans for Current Page & Site Duplicates
- Display redirect chains and loops
- Discover Redirect 301, 302, etc. such as permanent, temporary, JavaScript redirects and meta refreshes
- Displays External Links, status codes and source pages
- Display links from other pages that point to the scanned page
- Shows what Hypertext are used for the Hyperlinks for internal and external links

 
Canonical Tags:
- Scans for Missing Canonical Tag
- Scans to see if Canonical Tag does or does not match the pageâ€™s URL
- Scans for Current Page & Site Duplicates of Canonical Tag


PageSpeed Insights:
- Scans for scores for Core Web Vitals metrics of mobile and desktop devices


Download Htaccess:
- Generates custom file for high-level configuration of your website
- 301 Redirect File or Directory
- Rewrite to www
- Caching Javascript, CSS, and Images
- Prevent Hotlinking
- Custom Error Pages (400, 404, 500, etc)
- Change default directory page


Crawl Depth:
- Displays the crawl depth for each page


Content:
- Scans for the Word Count that are less than <250 words


Rich Snippets:
- Scans for incorrect Schema Markup
- Display issues with Structured Data


Title:
- Matches if Title is the same as H1 Tag
- Scans for Current Page & Site Duplicates
- Scans for Missing Title tag
- Displays Content Under 30 Characters
- Displays Content Over 60 Characters
- Shows issues with Multiple Title tag


Description:

- Scans for Missing Meta Description
- Displays Content Under 70 Characters
- Displays Content Over 155 Characters
- Shows issues with Multiple Meta Description


Meta Keywords:
- Scans for Missing Meta Keywords
- Scans for Page Duplicates
- Shows issues with Multiple Meta Keywords


H1 Tags:
- Scans for Current Page & Site Duplicates
- Scans for Missing H1 Tags

- Displays Content Over 60 Characters
- Shows issues with Multiple H1 Tags

 
H2-H6 Tags:

Improve Content:
- Quick alerts to notify of SEO issues for Title, Description, H1 Tags, H2-H6 Tags, and Content
- Keep original content whiles modifying text
- Displays Characters Count
- Adds Recommended Limits
- Displays Word Count
